relationships.head: Spring Boot Transaction Management with JDBC
relationships.tail: Managing Transactions in Spring Boot JDBC Applications

relationships.head: Spring Boot Transaction Management with JDBC
Spring Boot Transaction Management with JDBC
Spring Boot Transaction Management with JDBC
relationships.tail: Demonstrates transactional database operations in Spring Boot using JDBC and H2. Covers automatic configuration of DataSource, JdbcTemplate, and DataSourceTransactionManager. Includes schema initialization via schema.sql, @Transactional rollback handling, and CommandLineRunner usage. Shows transaction rollback scenarios for constraint violations (long names and null values).
